title: Ground Floor 1X1! Spacious Patio, Private Garage, Call Now!
posting_body: Visit This Website to See More:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 773 Sq.
The Mason Flats is a CENTRALLY LOCATED, Luxury apartment community located within the highly sought after Pleasanton, CA area -- Voted Top 50 Cities!
We couldn't be prouder to offer to Spacious 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Flats that boast a Stainless Steel Appliance Package (Gas Range!), a Full Sized Washer & Dryer and a Private Garage with EVERY HOME!
You will LOVE entertaining Family, Friends and Co-workers at THE CLUB!

The Fully-Appointed Amenities include (but are nowhere limited to): State of the Art GYM *all machines are phone compatible!, POOL & HOT TUB *both heated year round!, WiFi Lounge *we've got the cable and game covered!, Host's Kitchen and SO much more!
Don't Wait -- Call, "Reply" or Stop by TODAY to Discover the true Modern Luxury of The Mason Flats!
**Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765**Please consult the community leasing office to determine applicable licensed company.
We LOVE your Furry Family Members!
